response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product for $12,500. This price represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a favorable rate compared to its market value of $15,000. Should you choose to proceed, I assure you of our commitment to providing unparalleled customer service and support throughout the transaction and beyond. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 12500}
